video.title: El Chavo
video.synopsis: El Chavo is a poor, nameless orphan who lives in an apartment building with La Chilindrina, Quico, Doña Florinda, Don Ramón and Professor Jirafales.

episodes.synopsis: The children play that they have been run over using red paint and sausage, and Quico seems to be hurt. The doctor arrives, but treats Don Ramón because Doña Florinda hits him.
episodes.title: Los Atropellados

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón invites El Chavo over for breakfast. After a long wait, La Chilindrina arrives with the eggs, but Quico breaks them.
episodes.title: El Desayuno

episodes.synopsis: Chaos rocks the apartment complex when Quico scares his mother with a scorpion, causing her to throw a box of safety pins.
episodes.title: Ciencias Naturales II

episodes.synopsis: It's Independence Day, and the kids are throwing confetti, meanwhile, everyone reenacts the Mexican War of Independence.
episodes.title: Don Ramon Globero I

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón continues to take advantage of the celebration to sell his wares, meanwhile, El Chavo, Chilindrina, and Quico cause a ruckus.
episodes.title: Don Ramon Globero II

episodes.synopsis: New neighbors, Paty and her aunt Gloria, make quite an impression, causing a bout of jealousy to surge between the men of the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Celos en la Vecindad

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo is in love with Paty and Quico makes fun of him, meanwhile, Chilindrina becomes jealous. Don Ramón is also in love, but with Gloria.
episodes.title: La Gloria de Don Ramon

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and Quico faint after Paty congratulates them with a kiss. Gloria extends the same courtesy to Don Ramón. El Chavo leaves everyone stunned.
episodes.title: El Beso

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda threatens to not pay Sr. Barriga rent if he doesn't fix her leaky house. El Chavo and the gang have fun playing with the leaks.
episodes.title: Las Goteras

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda tells Quico that disobedient children will be sent to the junk collector. Meanwhile, Don Ramón works as a junk collector to earn money.
episodes.title: El Trabajo de Don Ramon

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón teaches El Chavo how to bowl, but things go awry. Sr. Barriga notices that Don Ramón has money for bowling, but not for rent.
episodes.title: Jugando con la Bola

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón makes a deal with Sr. Barriga, he'll trade five months rent for a bowling ball. El Chavo has a mishap while playing with the ball.
episodes.title: El Trato

episodes.synopsis: Professor Jirafales tries to give the kids a first aid course, but they don't get it. He decides to have them study, but it's already recess time.
episodes.title: Clases de Primeros Auxilios

episodes.synopsis: Sr. Barriga and El Chavo arrive at the hotel in Acapulco where the rest of the gang are staying. Chilindrina is quite happy to see that El Chavo came.
episodes.title: Aventuras en Acapulco I

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and the gang get into mischief in Acapulco. Everyone ends up singing the Chavo del 8 theme song, "Buenas Noches Vecindad".
episodes.title: Aventuras en Acapulco II

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda invites El Chavo and Chilindrina to see a Chanfle film. Don Ramón, not wanting to be left out, invites Doña Clotilde to the movies.
episodes.title: El Cine

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón changes the courtyard lightbulb after El Chavo breaks it. His plans are dashed when Chilindrina, El Chavo, and Popis break it again.
episodes.title: El Cambio de Foco

episodes.synopsis: Doña Clotilde gives Don Ramón two Valentine's cards. She hands him a blank one to give to Chilindrina, who then gives it to El Chavo.
episodes.title: La Fiesta de San Valentin

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda organizes a dinner at her house for Friendship Day. Everyone pitches in by bringing something but Don Ramón, who has nothing to give.
episodes.title: Festejando el Dia de la Amistad

episodes.synopsis: Doña Clotilde prepares a cake for Don Ramón, in hopes of seducing him, but El Chavo surprises both of them with his attitude.
episodes.title: Pretendiendo a Don Ramon

episodes.synopsis: Héctor Bonilla stops by the neighborhood in need of auto repair help. Professor Jirafales lends him a hand, while the ladies swoon.
episodes.title: El Actor Hector Bonilla

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón wants to pawn a rifle, but the kids get on his bad side and he declares war on them. While the kids are playing, El Chavo knocks Ñoño down.
episodes.title: La guerra contra los niños

episodes.synopsis: La Chilindrina wants a dog, but her father says she can't have one. So she has El Chavo pretend to be her dog and names him Peluchín.
episodes.title: El perro peluchin

episodes.synopsis: Professor Jirafales gives the kids a test and realizes they know absolutely nothing. He tries to explain some basic arithmetic with clear examples.
episodes.title: La clase de aritmetica

episodes.synopsis: The children think that Children's Day is the adults' fault so they look for a way to punish them, staging a protest to demand their rights.
episodes.title: Dia del niño

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo hasn't bathed in a few days, so the neighbors decide to give him a bath whether he likes it or not. The water buckets fly all over the place.
episodes.title: Manos negras del Chavo

episodes.synopsis: At school, Professor Jirafales asks the kids some questions. He tries to give them an English lesson, but their performance is disappointing at best.
episodes.title: Clases de ingles

episodes.synopsis: La Chilindrina gets some pet fish. Jirafales gives Florinda a cat, and La Chilindrina thinks the cat ate her fish.
episodes.title: Las mascotas

episodes.synopsis: It doesn't matter what the subject is; the kids in Professor Jirafales's classroom would much rather laugh than learn.
episodes.title: El examen de historia

episodes.synopsis: Clotilde has a dog named Satan. When she calls him, the kids think she's invoking the devil himself. Professor Jirafales has an accident.
episodes.title: El cachorro de doña cleotilde

episodes.synopsis: At school, the kids fail an arithmetic exam. Disappointed, Professor Jirafales moves on to Hygiene Class.
episodes.title: La clase de higiene

episodes.synopsis: Florinda prepares a surprise dinner for Professor Jirafales's birthday. But El Chavo and La Chilindrina put a wrench in the works.
episodes.title: El cumpleaños del profesor jirafales

episodes.synopsis: Florinda decides to open a diner and she has to clean it up before opening it up to customers. Jirafales offers to help, but the kids get in the way.
episodes.title: El restaurante de doña florinda

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo cries when he can't sell a lottery ticket. When Professor Jirafales sees him, he says he'll take the ticket, but he won't pay for it.
episodes.title: La suerte del profesor

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo asks Doña Florida for a job as a waiter at her diner, wanting to be near food. Don Barriga shows up for Florinda's rent, but stays to eat.
episodes.title: Spaguetti para el señor barriga

episodes.synopsis: La Chilindrina and El Chavo decide to have a tea party and go to Florinda's diner. El Chavo eats so fast he gets sick.
episodes.title: La congestion

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina sees Florinda give a customer free food because there's a fly in the coffee. She tells El Chavo. Barriga secretly buys food for the kids.
episodes.title: La mosca en el cafe

episodes.synopsis: The kids had a bad day at school, so they decide to take two days off. They make up excuses to justify their truancy, but Jirafales won't allow it.
episodes.title: El pretexto para ir a la escuela

episodes.synopsis: Jaimito comes to the neighborhood to deliver letters. El Chavo helps him and finds a letter for La Chilindrina from her grandmother.
episodes.title: El regreso de la biscabuela

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and La Chilindrina ask for donations for the Red Cross. The adults refuse to help out, and it's up to El Chavo to make them see the light.
episodes.title: Cooperacion para la cruz roja

episodes.synopsis: The kids go to the fair. El Chavo tries the Test Your Strength game, but his hammer swings are dangerously badly aimed.
episodes.title: La feria II

episodes.synopsis: La Chilindrina, Paty and El Chavo are having a tea party, and they convince El Chavo to try to steal a cake from Florinda's diner.
episodes.title: Los sueños

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo asks for a job, and Florinda makes the mistake of letting him work as a waiter. La Chilindrina has a plan to get Clotilde to buy her lunch.
episodes.title: El mesero

episodes.synopsis: It looks like there are mice at the diner, so Jirafales and Florinda buy mousetraps, while El Chavo and La Chilindrina try to hunt one down.
episodes.title: Roedores en la fonda I

episodes.synopsis: The diner is infested with mice. El Chavo sets up rat traps everywhere, but instead of catching rats, he catches Florinda and Jirafales.
episodes.title: Roedores en la fonda II

episodes.synopsis: At the diner, El Chavo isn't receiving a paycheck and he tells Nieves, who disagrees with what Florinda is doing to El Chavo and defends him.
episodes.title: Ayuda al trabajador

episodes.synopsis: Florinda doesn't have time to make the cake she promised Jirafales. So she sends El Chavo to go out and buy one and asks him to keep it a secret.
episodes.title: El pastel del profesor

episodes.synopsis: Barriga orders some repairs to the neighborhood, but since the residents have nowhere to go, he invites them to spend a few days at his house.
episodes.title: Reparacion de la vecindad I

episodes.synopsis: The apartments are under repairs. Jirafales is looking for Florinda when Jaimito causes a misunderstanding. The kids play at Barriga's house.
episodes.title: Reparacion de la vecindad II

episodes.synopsis: Christmas is on its way, and dinner is being prepared at Don Barriga's house, where everyone in the neighborhood will be gathering.
episodes.title: Quisiera ser pastor

episodes.synopsis: Florinda and Jirafales are still upset after the misunderstanding. The kids do all they can to get them back together. The apartments are finished.
episodes.title: Reparacion de la vecindad III

episodes.synopsis: When Florinda decides to buy a washing machine, everyone wonders why she doesn't come out to wash her clothes.
episodes.title: Lavadora nueva

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón tries to repair a guitar he found in the patio by gluing it together, but it's not a good idea to use glue when El Chavo is around.
episodes.title: Musico de segunda mano

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón offers to paint the complex to cover his back rent, but the kids get into the paint and make a huge mess of everything.
episodes.title: El mozo revoltoso

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón can’t get Chilindrina to take her medicine, and she throws a fit every time he tries.
episodes.title: La enfermedad de la chilindrina

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón lies that Chilindrina has measles to get out of paying the rent, but he causes trouble for the whole neighborhood.
episodes.title: Sarampion

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón tells Chilindrina that the rag and bones man will come and take her away. Quico loses a peso and sends Chilindrina to look for it.
episodes.title: Dinero perdido

episodes.synopsis: At the good neighbors party, everyone offers their ideas on what they should do for fun. Chavo accidentally bothers Chilindrina and everyone fights.
episodes.title: El enfermo / Buena vecindad

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina and Chavo decide to get Quico dirty because he doesn’t want to play with them. Chavo thinks everyone’s sick of him, so he leaves.
episodes.title: Ensuiciar a quico

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón and Chavo fall in love with the new neighbors and Chilindrina gets jealous over their behavior.
episodes.title: El Chavo y don Ramon se enamoran

episodes.synopsis: Chavo and Quico are in love with Patty and Don Ramón is in love with her aunt, but Chilindrina won’t stand for it.
episodes.title: El Chavo se enamora

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón works as a carpenter. Chilindrina plays jokes with a blowgun but Quico and Chavo have their revenge.
episodes.title: Cerbatanas y chochitos

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón complains about Doña Florinda’s cat because he says it eats his fish. So they decide to take action, not knowing what Chavo’s been up to.
episodes.title: El gato y los peces

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón is given a piece of cherimoya to transplant. Chilindrina tells Chavo they should play gardeners, but he plays a few pranks.
episodes.title: El jardinero

episodes.synopsis: Chavo and Chilindrina study the revolution. In the complex, everyone’s fighting over the clothesline. Chilindrina tells Chavo he should pull a prank.
episodes.title: Las coplas rancheras / Las preguntas / El tendedero

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón and Chavo get work at a beauty salon. Chavo accidentally makes life difficult for Don Barriga and Quico.
episodes.title: El bolero y el peluquero

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina, Chavo and Quico skip school and plan on claiming Chavo got the garrotera so they don’t get in trouble.
episodes.title: Faltando a clases en domingo

episodes.synopsis: The kids play in the yard with little boats in a tub of water, but they get jealous of each other and fight. So do Don Ramón and Doña Florinda.
episodes.title: Por jugar con el agua

episodes.synopsis: Chavo and Chilindrina decide to play ghosts and scare Quico. But they scare Doña Florinda and Don Ramón instead.
episodes.title: El mareo / los sustos

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina cries thinking her father is marrying Doña Eduviges. An uncle of Don Ramón’s dies and he inherits a huge suit, and the kids play with it.
episodes.title: El traje

episodes.synopsis: All the neighbors work together to throw a good neighbors party. Chavo tells a story and Quico recites a poem for his mother. It doesn’t go well.
episodes.title: La fiesta de la vecindad

episodes.synopsis: Florinda makes a sign forbidding animals and small children. Clotilde hides her niece in Don Ramón’s basket and they accuse him of stealing children.
episodes.title: El robachicos

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda complains about all the trash left over from the Independence Day party. Chavo offers to sweep up for a peso.
episodes.title: El patio sucio despues de la fiesta

episodes.synopsis: Chavo plays with bugs in the yard. Quico comes up with a bag of popcorn. Chavo fills the bag with bugs and everyone eats from it.
episodes.title: Los insectos

episodes.synopsis: Chavo, Chilindrina and Quico make homemade instruments and play orchestra. Don Ramón tells them to keep it down, but Jirafales defends them.
episodes.title: Grupo musical

episodes.synopsis: Quico takes the stick from Clotilde’s dog and tells Chavo it’s the witch’s magic wand. The kids think Clotilde has turned Don Ramón into a dog.
episodes.title: El perro

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda sends Quico to get a cake for Jirafales. The Witch from Apartment 71 gives Chavo a cake with a note for him to give it to Don Ramón.
episodes.title: Los pasteleros

episodes.synopsis: Chavo cries when no one buys a lottery ticket from him. Don Ramón buys them all and thinks he’s won, but Chavo has some bad news for him.
episodes.title: El billete de loteria

episodes.synopsis: Quico is sick and he asks Chavo to throw his medicine out the window, where they hit Don Ramón in the face.
episodes.title: La enfermedad de quico

episodes.synopsis: The kids collect money and blood for the Red Cross. Don Ramón tries to plead insanity to get out of paying the rent. Chavo and Quico get everyone wet.
episodes.title: El loco

episodes.synopsis: Doña Clotilde arrives with her shopping bag. Quico ties his balloons to the basket, and it flies away. Chavo shoots it with his slingshot.
episodes.title: Los globos

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Hurtado leaves the neighborhood after robbing everyone and leaving the goods in Chavo’s barrel. Everyone thinks Chavo did it, so he leaves.
episodes.title: El ladron del senor hurtado

episodes.synopsis: Chavo is in a hurry to get to school, but Quico and Popis are taking their time. At school, the kids cause trouble. Jirafales kicks Popis out.
episodes.title: Llegando tarde a la escuela

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón tells the kids he’s giving them a formula that makes them invisible. Barriga scratches his back and Chavo thinks he’s under attack.
episodes.title: La invisibilidad

episodes.synopsis: Chavo catches a lizard and scares Doña Clotilde and Doña Florinda. Malicha, Don Ramón’s goddaughter, calls Clotilde a witch.
episodes.title: La lagartija

episodes.synopsis: Quico is off to a party and he doesn’t want to get his clothes dirty. Chavo and Malicha decide to throw talc at him, but Doña Florinda takes it away.
episodes.title: Harina para polvorear

episodes.synopsis: Chavo plays house, but Quico knocks everything down. Chavo accidentally hits Barriga, Ñoño and Don Ramón. Florinda thinks he’s drunk and hits him.
episodes.title: La casita del Chavo

episodes.synopsis: Quico and Chavo have an accident with the pipes. They have to bring water from the building across the street, but they end up causing trouble.
episodes.title: Falta de agua

episodes.synopsis: The kids play carpenters with Don Ramón’s tools. They try to fix Doña Florinda’s chair, but they just end up causing more trouble.
episodes.title: Intento de robo / Los caquitos / La carpinteria

episodes.synopsis: Chavo becomes a businessman with his own juice stand. Chavo makes a killing threatening to tell Mr. Barriga where Don Ramón is hiding.
episodes.title: Las aguas frescas I

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón has insomnia so Doña Clotilde offers him a syrup, but Chavo thinks it’s a magic potion. Quico puts the syrup in the juice Chavo’s selling.
episodes.title: Las aguas frescas II

episodes.synopsis: Chavo plays baseball and gets in a fight with Quico and Ñoño. Don Ramón doesn’t have money to pay the rent and Chavo gives him a coin.
episodes.title: La casa de la viejita el beisbol

episodes.synopsis: Ñoño has a book full of old stamps and the kids all get in a fight. Chavo finds a roll of cash belonging to Mr. Barriga and confuses it with stamps.
episodes.title: Estampitas

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón teaches Chavo to box. Chavo tries to teach Quico to box, but they get in trouble.
episodes.title: Clases de box

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón doesn’t have the money to pay the rent so Mr. Barriga asks him to work it off. The kids play with the plaster mix and Quico is a statue.
episodes.title: Los yeseros

episodes.synopsis: Cyrano de Bergerac is in love with his cousin Roxana. Everyone makes fun of his nose. Don Ramón asks Chavo to water the flowers, but he waters Ramón.
episodes.title: Cyrano de bergerac / Perdonar a los enemigos

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Barriga has a corn that keeps getting stepped on. Quico signs an IOU, making Chavo feel like a millionaire. Don Ramón has a pain in his foot.
episodes.title: El callo

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón tells Chavo to shout an encoded message to let him know if Mr. Barriga is coming by. The kids use Ramón’s instructions to play pranks.
episodes.title: Los platillos voladores si existen

episodes.synopsis: The kids write a letter to Santa Claus. Everyone celebrates Christmas with Quico. Mr. Barriga gives everyone a present, but Chavo gives his away.
episodes.title: Carta a Santa Claus

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón starts selling old junk. Mr. Barriga sees him with an old bowling ball, and thinks if he can pay to go bowling, he can pay the rent.
episodes.title: El ropavejero

episodes.synopsis: Clotilde is attracted to Román, Ramón’s cousin. Román tosses a box not knowing Quico is standing there. The kids think Quico’s been turned into a box.
episodes.title: El primo de don Ramon

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón and Professor Jirafales.must pool their patience when it's time to teach El Chavo and Quico how to play the guitar.
episodes.title: La guitarra

episodes.synopsis: The kids play firefighters. They get Jirafales and Florinda wet, and they grab Don Ramón and splash him too.
episodes.title: Los bomberos

episodes.synopsis: Chavo criticizes Don Ramón for not studying and Clotilde makes him do it. Quico invites him to play Independence and they make a huge mess.
episodes.title: La independencia

episodes.synopsis: Ramón is selling old junk. Florinda gives him more than he can handle. Chavo hits him because he thinks he’s taking Quico away in that sack of junk.
episodes.title: El viejo del costal

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón sells Quico a bowling ball. Doña Florinda doesn’t want it, but Mr. Barriga thinks it’s worth five months’ rent.
episodes.title: La bola de boliche

episodes.synopsis: The kids play with yoyos and take down the clothesline. Don Ramón comes out with a shotgun to yell at the kids, who are sure he’s going to kill them.
episodes.title: La guerra del Chavo

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón is happy when a beautiful girl comes asking about an apartment, but the kids are so eager to help him they end up getting cake all over her.
episodes.title: Mujeres y don Ramon

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón welcomes Gloria and her niece Patty, the new neighbors, to the complex. Their presence sows discord among the kids and a jealous Clotilde.
episodes.title: Las vecinas nuevas

episodes.synopsis: Clotilde is after Don Ramón, but he’s after the new neighbor. Ramón invites Gloria to the movies, so excited he doesn’t even feel Florinda’s punches.
episodes.title: Invitacion al cine

episodes.synopsis: Gloria, the new neighbor, and her niece Patty have all the boys in the complex drooling. Don Ramón faints when Gloria kisses him.
episodes.title: Los desmayos

episodes.synopsis: Quico buys a balloon, but he lets it go and it gets stuck. Chilindrina convinces Chavo to get it down, but it pops. They buy more but Chavo pops them.
episodes.title: Ponchando globos

episodes.synopsis: The kids break the light bulb in the yard. Ramón tries to change it, but Chavo keeps breaking them. Don Ramón and the neighbors all get a shock.
episodes.title: El foco

episodes.synopsis: The Chavo is playing in the neighborhood but the tenants start to realize that everything he touches is dirtied, so they decide to give him a bath.
episodes.title: Tratando de banar al Chavo

episodes.synopsis: Chavo kills some bugs and puts them in a bag. Chilindrina eats them. Don Ramón drinks gasoline by accident, and then decides to light up a cigar.
episodes.title: Las palomitas del Chavo

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón gets a job delivering milk, but he runs into Florinda and Chavo, who make him see how lucky he is.
episodes.title: El lechero

episodes.synopsis: The kids play orchestra in the yard, but they’re making too much noise. Don Ramón yells at them but Jirafales argues with him.
episodes.title: Musica para todos

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Barriga likes bullfighting, and Don Ramón decides to take advantage of it. Jirafales joins them and leaves Doña Florinda feeling abandoned.
episodes.title: Los toreros y toros

episodes.synopsis: Chavo wants to plant an egg in a flowerpot. Jirafales tells him it’s not going to work. The kids play with dirt, and then they have to clean up.
episodes.title: La siembra de un huevo

episodes.synopsis: The kids arrive with Don Ramón for the exam. Jirafales scolds Quico for copying and gives an oral exam, but nobody can answer any of the questions.
episodes.title: Examenes I

episodes.synopsis: The kids are sad that the complex is up for sale. Mr. Calvillo is planning to tear it down and build a luxury apartment building.
episodes.title: Venta de la vecindad II

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón is selling balloons. Chavo pops everyone’s balloons with a cigar. They yell at him, so he decides to go, but Ramón offers him some balloons.
episodes.title: El globero

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón accidentally takes his boss’s hat. Chavo is in charge of holding Jirafales and Don Ramón’s hats, but he gets them mixed up.
episodes.title: Los sombreros

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón takes Chavo’s lottery ticket, but he doesn’t pay for it. When he sees that it’s a winner, Chavo gives him some bad news.
episodes.title: El sorteo de la loteria

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales teaches the kids about animals. He asks them questions all throughout the class, but Ñoño’s the only one who ever knows the answer.
episodes.title: Clases de animales

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales’s visit causes an argument between Doña Florinda and Don Ramón, since he has his clothes out to dry and she thinks it looks bad.
episodes.title: Los pantalones del tendedero

episodes.synopsis: Doña Clotilde is looking for her dog Satanás. Don Ramón has an accident and the kids think the Witch from Apartment 71 turned him into a dog.
episodes.title: Invocando a satanas

episodes.synopsis: The good neighbors festival runs into some trouble due to bad planning by Don Ramón. Chavo ruins Mr. Barriga’s hat with his magic tricks.
episodes.title: Festival de la buena vecindad III

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina takes up a collection for the Red Cross. Don Ramón doesn’t want to pay the rent. When Mr. Barriga comes to collect, Ramón has to escape.
episodes.title: Las locuras de don Ramon

episodes.synopsis: The neighbors are holding a Christmas celebration. The kids make piñatas, but Chavo breaks them before the party begins.
episodes.title: Fiesta navideña

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón gives Chavo advice on earning and saving money, but when Mr. Barriga finds out Don Ramón has a piggybank, he demands the rent.
episodes.title: El negocio de las botellas

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda invites the neighbors to her house to celebrate the Friendship Festival, but Don Ramón doesn’t want to go, so they have it at his house.
episodes.title: Dia de la amistad

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina uses her father’s ties to jump rope. Chavo uses a tie as a leash for his dog Ramoncito. Don Ramón isn’t too pleased about this.
episodes.title: Ramoncito

episodes.synopsis: There are no pets allowed, so Florinda returns the dog Mr. Jirafales gave her. Quico sneaks in a mouse. The kids play cruel tricks on Chilindrina.
episodes.title: Una broma blanca

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón is working as a photographer, but a camera isn’t safe with these kids around. The kids decide to play photographers but end up fighting.
episodes.title: La fotografia

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina and Chavo play airplane, and get in a fight with Clotilde. They play with balloons, but they start to fight and Quico steps on Jirafales.
episodes.title: Ayuda a tus semejantes

episodes.synopsis: Don Barriga and Mr. Jirafales take off their jackets for a brawl. They ask Chavo to hold their jackets, which of course turns out to be a bad idea.
episodes.title: El saco del senor Barriga

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón decides to sell balloons. Chavo helps him out with his business by popping Quico’s balloons so he’ll buy more. Mr. Barriga falls for it too.
episodes.title: El negocio de los globos

episodes.synopsis: Chavo is hungry. Don Ramón is sleepwalking and leaves food in his barrel every night. Clotilde says the food is being left by a trickster poltergeist.
episodes.title: Sonambulos I

episodes.synopsis: Chavo pretends to sleepwalk so he can steal a bag of bread from Quico’s house. Doña Clotilde decides to organize a séance.
episodes.title: Sonambulos II

episodes.synopsis: Clotilde organizes a séance at Don Ramón’s house. Chavo hides under the table and scares everyone, making them think there’s a ghost around.
episodes.title: Sonambulos III

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina returns after spending the weekend with her aunts in Guanajuato. Don Ramón catches her using Chavo’s blowgun and spanks her.
episodes.title: Un fin de semana con las tias

episodes.synopsis: Quico asks Chavo to say he’s the one who drew a mean picture of Jirafales and he’ll give him a ham sandwich, but the teacher rewards his creativity.
episodes.title: La caricatura del profesor jirafales

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón lies that Chilindrina has a highly contagious disease to get out of paying the rent. She uses the same excuse to get out of school.
episodes.title: La mentira de la chilindrina

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón mixes the paint to start painting the complex. Chavo finds it fascinating, and everyone has fun painting.
episodes.title: Pintando la vecindad II

episodes.synopsis: Doña Clotilde burns the bread she’s making for Don Ramón. Chilindrina and Chavo play a prank.
episodes.title: La pancita de don Ramon

episodes.synopsis: Don Barriga offers to let Don Ramón work off a few months of back rent fixing up the complex. Chavo tries to help, but he just gets in the way.
episodes.title: Enyesar la vecindad I

episodes.synopsis: Chavo sells newspapers and Don Ramón puts on a yoyo show to earn money. Quico and Chavo challenge each other to a yoyo competition.
episodes.title: El voceador

episodes.synopsis: Doña Florinda wants to surprise Jirafales with a cake and sends Quico to buy it. Doña Clotilde makes a cake for Don Ramón, and confusion arises.
episodes.title: La sorpresa del profesor

episodes.synopsis: In the classroom, the kids and Mr. Jirafales talk about hygiene. The neighbors want to give Chavo a bath. Jirafales throws water into his barrel.
episodes.title: El bano del Chavo

episodes.synopsis: The kids play soccer in the yard and hit Mr. Barriga with the ball, so he tells them they’re not allowed to play anymore. Florinda doesn’t like it.
episodes.title: Pateando la pelota

episodes.synopsis: Chavo is tired and starts falling asleep all over the yard, and everyone keeps tripping over him. The kids wake him up and they play freeze tag.
episodes.title: Una noche de desvelo

episodes.synopsis: The kids play with the fuse switch, flipping it on and off. Don Ramón can’t iron and goes to investigate, but comes back to find his clothing burned.
episodes.title: Los astronautas

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Barriga gives Chavo a peso to watch his car. Chavo asks for two pesos to wash the car. Everyone gets wet and gets a cold except Chavo and Ramón.
episodes.title: El Chavo lava coches

episodes.synopsis: Everyone calls Don Ramón stupid because he never went to school, but Doña Clotilde doesn’t care, she likes rough men.
episodes.title: Nunca es demasiado tarde para estudiar

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina wins a trip to Acapulco in a raffle. Everyone plans to go, but Chavo will be all alone. Mr. Barriga invites Chavo to go with them.
episodes.title: Viaje a acapulco

episodes.synopsis: Chilindrina proposes a game to Chavo and Popis: they’ll make pies with her father’s shaving cream. Chavo and Popis eat them anyway.
episodes.title: Los pasteles de la chilindrina

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón gives Chilindrina a book of animals. Popis and Chilindrina hit Chavo and Don Ramón has a word with his daughter.
episodes.title: Los animales que pegan
